DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate joint angle joint moment flexion-extension , adduction-abduction internal -external rotation elastic therapeutic tape elastic therapeutic tape effective ACL-injuries subject drop vertical jump.This study require ACL-injuries participant age range 18 45 year old . The 3D motion analysis system ( BTS , ITALY ) force plate ( Kistler , USA ) use measure joint angle joint moment drop vertical jump movement .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Elastic Therapeutic Tape Biomechanical Changes Knee Joint During Drop Vertical Jump ACL Injuries
DOC.detailed_description: # Participants ACL-injures subject ACL-injury group recruit people ACL-injuries grade I-II least 8 week measure joint laxity test stress X-ray Telos ( side side difference 3 - 8 mm . ) . Inclusion criteria ACL-injuries group : 1 ) collateral ligament meniscus injury , 2 ) joint pain knee joint effusion ( le 2 cm . opposite side measure joint line , 3 ) history previous injury structure low extremity result ligamentous laxity ankle hip , 4 ) current medical problem vestibular system , visual system neurological condition impair ability perform sidestep cut task , 5 ) joint structural deformity flat foot , genu valgus genu varus , 6 ) able complete functional test ( Single hop distance Triple hop distance ) distance le 85 % unaffected side . Exclusion criterion include 1 ) knee joint swell great 2 cm . unaffected side , 2 ) joint laxity test stress X-ray Telos ( side side difference great 8 mm . ) - Instrumentation 1 . Three-dimensional motion analysis system ( Bioengineering Inc. , ITALY ) 2 . Visual 3D software ( C-motion , USA ) 3 . A force platform 60x40x10 centimeter size ( Kistler Instrument Corp. , USA ) 4 . Running shoe ( Adidas ) US Size 7 , 8 , 9 , 10 5 . Goniometer 6 . Vernier caliber 7 . Measuring tape 8 . Therapeutic tape ; ( KinesioTex® ) 9 . Telos arthrometer GA III/E ( Metax GmbH ) 10. International Knee Documentation Committee Score ( IKDC ) 11 . Knee Osteoarthritis Outcome Score ( KOOS ) - Subject preparation participant ACL-injuries Participants ask fill questionnaire age , height , weight history injury musculoskeletal problem . Participants inform make understanding purpose , method advantage study . Also , participant ask sign consent form . IKDC KOOD interview conducted.The test include hop test drop vertical jump conduct Faculty Medicine Ramathibodi , Mahidol University . Anthropometric data , navicular drop test , ROM muscle strength knee joint perform participant . Participants ask perform single hop distance triple hop side leg . Stress X-ray Telos® Participants screen joint laxity stress x-ray Telos . Lateral view x-ray perform side lie position knee flexion 10 20 degree . Front cushion pad apply distal femur distal tibia . Pressure load apply 6 cm knee joint line 15 daN . Participants ACL injury subject rest 10 minute quiet room elastic therapeutic tape apply affected side . Drop vertical jump perform follow run 30 minute speed 7 km/hr . Participants ask perform drop vertical jump task run . Drop vertical jump Drop vertical jump landing trail perform 31 cm . box . Participants informed jump two hand head high possible land force plate foot separate force plate . Participants ask perform task reach three successful trial . Successful trial define participant land force plate foot separate force plate without step . # Parameters Knee joint angle moment initial contact weight acceptance phase 1 . Flexion - Extension 2 . Adduction - Abduction 3 . Internal - External rotation - Statistics All data present mean ± stand error mean . All statistical test perform use SPSS window version 17 program . The level significance difference group set p < 0.05 . Comparison 3D joint angle moment affect leg unaffected leg ACL-injuries group side step movement test Paired T test .
DOC.criteria: 1 . ACLinjuries grade III least 8 week measure joint laxity test stress Xray Telos ( side side difference 3 8 mm . ) 2 . No collateral ligaments meniscus injury 3 . No joint pain knee joint effusion ( le 2 cm . opposite side measure joint line 4 . No history previous injury structure low extremity result ligamentous laxity ankle hip 5 . No current medical problem vestibular system , visual system neurological condition impair ability perform sidestep cut task 6 . No joint structural deformity flat foot , genu valgus genu varus 7 . Able complete functional test ( Single hop distance Triple hop distance ) distance le 85 % unaffected side 1 . Knee joint swell great 2 cm . unaffected side 2 . Joint laxity test stress Xray Telos ( side side difference great 8 mm . ) 3 . Unable complete functional test ( Single hop distance Triple hop distance ) distance le 85 % unaffected side
